seniority_level.evidence: Minimum 3 years experience required, title is 'Data Engineer' without senior/staff designation, education requirement is bachelor's level

job_family.evidence: Title explicitly states 'Data Engineer', responsibilities focus on BI/DW, reporting, ETL, and data integration

sub_specialty.evidence: Focus on BI/DW projects, reporting/visualization, ETL/Data Integration tools (DataStage, Informatica, ADF) - all batch-oriented

leadership_expectation.evidence: No mention of team leadership, mentoring, or people management responsibilities; focus is on individual technical delivery

primary_cloud.evidence: Nice-to-have skills include AWS, Google Cloud, and Azure - no single cloud is required or emphasized

secondary_clouds.evidence: AWS, Google Cloud, and Azure are all mentioned as preferred experience, indicating multi-cloud exposure

processing_paradigm.evidence: Focus on ETL, reporting, and data integration tools (DataStage, Informatica, ADF) which are primarily batch-oriented

orchestrator_category.evidence: Azure Data Factory mentioned as preferred tool, which is a cloud-native orchestrator

storage_layer.evidence: Focus on BI/DW projects and Cognos reporting implies data warehouse architecture

remote_restriction.evidence: Location specified as Pune, Maharashtra, India with onsite work model

timezone_focus.evidence: Location restricted to India (Pune, Maharashtra) with onsite requirement

relocation_required.evidence: Onsite work model in Pune, Maharashtra, India implies relocation may be required for non-local candidates

h1b_friendly.evidence: No mention of visa sponsorship; location is India, not US

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: Location is India; OPT/CPT are US-specific student visa categories

citizenship_required.evidence: Location is India; implies authorization to work in India is required, no citizenship requirement stated

w2_vs_1099.evidence: Full-time permanent position at IBM, typical for W2 employment

benefits_level.evidence: No benefits mentioned in the job posting or extraction results

growth_path_clarity.evidence: No explicit career path mentioned; only general 'continuous improvement' and 'innovation' language

mentorship_signals.evidence: Mentions working with 'business and technical members of the team' and 'client environment' implying collaboration with experienced colleagues

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No mention of promotions, advancement, or career progression

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No mention of internal transfers, role changes, or mobility opportunities

career_tracks_available.evidence: No career tracks (IC, management, specialist, architect) mentioned in the posting

requirement_strictness.evidence: Clear must-have skills (Cognos, UNIX, BI/DW) vs nice-to-have (cloud platforms, ETL tools) with 3+ years experience required

scope_definition.evidence: Focused role on BI/DW, reporting, visualization, and ETL with specific tool requirements (Cognos)

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: 3 years experience required for mid-level role with reasonable skill set (Cognos, UNIX, BI/DW) - no unrealistic expectations
